definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Why I often upset stomach, still vomit.
sentences.chinese: 为什么我经常肚子痛，还呕吐。

sentences.english: Have a cold or a tummy ache?
sentences.chinese: 感冒了或者是肚子痛恶劣？

sentences.english: Patient:Well, I've got a terrible stomach-ache and I keep needing the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 我的肚子痛得非常厉害，而且我总要频繁去洗手间。

sentences.english: That night, he had a stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 结果它肚子痛了一个晚上。

sentences.english: You and two of your family members had severe stomachaches the following day.
sentences.chinese: 您和您的两名家庭成员有严重肚子痛翌日。

sentences.english: The engineer examined the engine of the  mining  machine for  stomach.
sentences.chinese: 工程师检查采矿机的发动机是否有肚子痛。

sentences.english: Mother doctored us for colds and stomachaches.
sentences.chinese: 她为她的孩子治疗伤风和肚子痛。

sentences.english: She doctors her children for colds and stomachaches.
sentences.chinese: 她为她的孩子治疗伤风和肚子痛。

sentences.english: If I have got stomachache, i will go to doctor this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 如果我肚子痛，今天下午我就去看医生。

sentences.english: But soon I had a stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 但是马上我开始肚子痛。

sentences.english: Has long been used in folk An Xi Tie Guan Yin treatment of diarrhea and stomach pain practice.
sentences.chinese: 在安溪民间早有采用铁观音治疗痢疾和肚子痛的做法。

sentences.english: Because he doesn't get mad often, he's prone to gastroenteritis and stomachaches.
sentences.chinese: 因为不常生气，所以容易有肠胃炎或者肚子痛。

sentences.english: Arises suddenly the belly pain, the ache is hard to endure, lies down time the rest.
sentences.chinese: 突发肚子痛，疼痛难忍，躺下休息时。

sentences.english: Some roommates were invited to enjoy the food.Unfortunately, after finishing it, all of their faces got pale and had stomachaches.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，吃完后，他们都脸色苍白，肚子痛。

sentences.english: The engineer examined the engine of the mining machine for stomach.
sentences.chinese: 工程师检查采矿机的发动机是否有肚子痛。

sentences.english: Today, I'm working security for an apartment complex and I have severe diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在一个小区做保安，肚子痛起来。

definition: to get sick because of bad food
